      • allocate

        long allocate(long capacity)
        Allocates memory and returns the low level base address of the newly allocated memory region.
        Parameters:
        capacity - to allocate
        Returns:
        the low level base address of the newly allocated memory region
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the capacity is non-positive
        OutOfMemoryError - if there are not enough memory to allocate
